## How To Test

Commands or steps to verify:

```bash
go test ./...
npm ci
npm run test:ui
```

## Checklist

- [ ] Go tests pass (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] UI tests pass (`npm run test:ui`) if applicable
- [ ] Docs updated (if behavior changes)
- [ ] Third-party notices updated (if vendoring new deps)
